full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BUM GTER CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
